item.title: file not recognized: File truncated错误解决办法
item.description: 使用rpmbuild重新编译clamav，遇到了：file not recognized: File truncated。感觉不像时程序代码问题，找到以下解决办法： when the compilation line looks like:c++ -Dmylib\_EXPORTS
